articles.title: Heavy breathers could be Covid-19 SUPERSPREADERS - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers found heavy breathers are likely superspreaders of coronavirus, as they disproportionately contribute to the production of infectious aerosols.
articles.content:
It has long been known that superspreaders are responsible for the vast majority of coronavirus infections and now a study has found heavy breathers are likely culprits.
